Title: Boingrot Bounderz
Legend: Squig riders who have managed to survive more than a single, violently, short-lived battle, Boingrot Bounderz wear loon helms and skewer their enemies with wickedly pointed pokin’ lances.
Intro: Each model in a Boingrot Bounderz unit is armed with a Pokin’ Lance.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Squigalanche • Squiggly Hangerz-on

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Cave Squigs are each armed with a Fang-filled Gob.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Bounder Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Pokin’ Lance.

Rules.Name: Boing! Smash!
Rules.Fluff: Mobs of Boingrot Bounderz smash into their enemies like toothy meteors.
Rules.Rule: After this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Rules.Name: Lances Of The Bounderz
Rules.Fluff: The pokin’ lances carried by Boingrot Bounderz are especially dangerous on the charge.
Rules.Rule: Lances of the Bounderz: If this unit made a charge move in the same turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Pokin’ Lances and improve the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Pokin’ Lances by 1.
